citations.narrative:
The licensee does not have a contingency plan in place. Not having a contingency plan doesn't ensure the licensee will
be prepared should an emergency or disaster happen. The licensee must complete the contingency plan in accordance
with the requirements outlined in the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by 5/10/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative.
End of report.

narrative:
2.134 
   
Contingency planning. 
The licensee does not have a contingency plan in place. Not having a contingency plan doesn't ensure the licensee will 
be prepared should an emergency or disaster happen. The licensee must complete the contingency plan in accordance 
with the requirements outlined in the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by 5/10/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
